text: Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness is a medical spa with locations in Kensington, Maryland and Falls Church, Virginia. The clinic focuses on personalized care, natural-looking results, and a welcoming environment.
Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness offers facials, customized skincare treatments, RF microneedling, IPL therapy, chemical peels, and PRX Collagen Stimulator.
Injectable services include neurotoxins such as Botox-style treatments and dermal fillers. Treatments focus on subtle, natural results.
Additional services include DeRive Hair Restoration, laser hair removal, ketamine therapy, and vitamin IV therapy.
Complimentary consultations are offered to discuss aesthetic and wellness goals and recommend appropriate treatments.
Kensington location: 10901 Connecticut Ave #201, Kensington, MD 20895. Falls Church location: 124 E Broad St Suite A, Falls Church, VA 22046.
Appointments can be scheduled online, by phone, or in person at either location.
